trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 代表自訂屬性的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Attribute> class associates predefined system information or user-defined custom information with a target element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Attribute>類別預先定義的系統資訊或使用者定義自訂的資訊將與相關聯的目標項目。

trans-unit.source: A target element can be an assembly, class, constructor, delegate, enum, event, field, interface, method, portable executable file module, parameter, property, return value, struct, or another attribute.
trans-unit.target: 組件、 類別、 建構函式、 委派、 列舉、 事件、 欄位、 介面、 方法、 可攜式執行檔模組、 參數、 屬性、 傳回值、 結構或另一個屬性，可以是目標項目。

trans-unit.source: Information provided by an attribute is also known as metadata.
trans-unit.target: 屬性所提供的資訊就是所謂的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Metadata can be examined at run time by your application to control how your program processes data, or before run time by external tools to control how your application itself is processed or maintained.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料可在執行階段檢查您的應用程式，可控制您的程式如何處理資料，或由外部工具，來控制執行階段之前如何您本身的應用程式處理或維護。

trans-unit.source: For example, the .NET Framework predefines and uses attribute types to control run-time behavior, and some programming languages use attribute types to represent language features not directly supported by the .NET Framework common type system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，.NET Framework 會預先定義和使用來控制執行階段行為的屬性類型和某些程式設計語言使用屬性型別表示不直接支援的.NET Framework 一般類型系統的語言功能。

trans-unit.source: All attribute types derive directly or indirectly from the <xref:System.Attribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的屬性類型直接或間接衍生自<xref:System.Attribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Attributes can be applied to any target element; multiple attributes can be applied to the same target element; and attributes can be inherited by an element derived from a target element.
trans-unit.target: 屬性可以套用至任何目標項目。多個屬性可以套用至相同的目標項目。可由衍生自目標元素的項目繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AttributeTargets> class to specify the target element to which the attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AttributeTargets>類別，以指定要套用屬性的目標項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Attribute> class provides convenient methods to retrieve and test custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Attribute>類別提供方便的方法來擷取和測試的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md) and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[套用屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)和[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the usage of <xref:System.Attribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Attribute>。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is only called by classes that derive from <xref:System.Attribute>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自的類別只會呼叫這個建構函式<xref:System.Attribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the definition of a custom parameter <xref:System.Attribute> class with its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範自訂參數定義<xref:System.Attribute>其建構函式類別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with this instance or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體或 <see langword="null" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值指出此執行個體是否與指定的物件相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> and this instance are of the same type and have identical field values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 和這個執行個體是相同的類型並擁有完全相同的欄位值，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A> method uses reflection to retrieve field information for the current instance and the `obj` argument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>方法會使用反映來擷取目前的執行個體的欄位資訊和`obj`引數。

trans-unit.source: It then compares field values.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會比較欄位值。

trans-unit.source: When implementing your own class derived from <xref:System.Attribute>, you can override the <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當實作您自己的類別衍生自<xref:System.Attribute>，您可以覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Because it uses reflection, we recommend that you do so.
trans-unit.target: 因為它會使用反映，我們建議您這麼做。

trans-unit.source: However, your override should perform a standard test for reference equality (the two arguments represent the same object instance) or value equality (the two arguments are of the same type and have identical field values).
trans-unit.target: 不過，您的覆寫應該執行標準的測試 （兩個引數代表相同的物件執行個體） 的參考相等的值相等 （兩個引數屬於相同類型和有相同的欄位值）。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a custom comparison to determine whether two attributes objects are equal, you can override the <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行自訂比較來決定兩個屬性物件是否相等，您可以覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines two custom parameter <xref:System.Attribute> classes, then creates several objects of each class and uses the <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A> method to compare them.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義兩個自訂參數<xref:System.Attribute>類別，則會建立數個物件的每個類別並使用<xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>來比較它們的方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type applied to an assembly, module, type member, or method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至組件、模組、型別成員或方法參數的指定型別之自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> class that describes a reusable collection of modules.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 類別的物件，描述可重複使用的模組集合。

trans-unit.source: The type, or a base type, of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別或基底型別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a custom attribute applied to a specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至指定之組件的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the assembly and the type of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定組件，以及要搜尋的自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the single custom attribute of type <paramref name="attributeType" /> that is applied to <paramref name="element" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no such attribute.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的單一自訂屬性參考，套用於 <paramref name="element" />；如果沒有這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法，如果您預期會傳回多個值或<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，此方法傳回的安全性屬性，如果屬性儲存在新的中繼資料格式。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 or later use the new format.
trans-unit.target: 以版本 2.0 或更新版本所編譯的組件會使用新的格式。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。

trans-unit.source: See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[發出宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用<xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttribute%2A>方法擷取<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>做為參數。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.target: 找到一個以上要求的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 類別的物件，描述建構函式、事件、欄位、方法或類別的屬性 (Property) 成員。

trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別或基底型別。

trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至型別成員的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.target: 型別 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的單一自訂屬性參考，套用於 <paramref name="element" />；如果沒有這類屬性，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A match is determined in the same way described in the Return Value section of <xref:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 相符項目由相同的傳回值一節所述的方式決定<xref:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on types, methods, and constructors if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，此方法傳回的安全性屬性類型、 方法和建構函式如果屬性儲存在新的中繼資料格式。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。

trans-unit.target: 傳回值包含的自訂屬性的上階`element`如果`inherit`是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，此方法傳回的安全性屬性方法、 建構函式，以及類型如果屬性儲存在新的中繼資料格式。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 or later use the new format.
trans-unit.target: 以版本 2.0 或更新版本所編譯的組件會使用新的格式。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。

trans-unit.source: See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[發出宣告式安全性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A>, taking a <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Attribute.GetCustomAttributes%2A>，並且<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a constructor, method, property, event, type, or field.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是建構函式、方法、屬性、事件、型別或欄位。

trans-unit.source: A custom attribute type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> class that describes a constructor, event, field, method, or property member of a class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 類別的物件，描述建構函式、事件、欄位、方法或類別的屬性 (Property) 成員。

trans-unit.source: The type, or a base type, of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別或基底型別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of the custom attributes applied to a member of a type.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至型別成員的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the member, and the type of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定成員，以及要搜尋的自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that contains the custom attributes of type <paramref name="type" /> applied to <paramref name="element" />, or an empty array if no such custom attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列，包含套用至 <paramref name="type" /> 的型別 <paramref name="element" /> 的自訂屬性；如果不存在這類自訂屬性，則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The return value contains the custom attributes for ancestors of `element`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值包含的自訂屬性的上階`element`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> class that describes a parameter of a member of a class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 類別的物件，描述類別成員的參數。

trans-unit.source: The type, or a base type, of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別或基底型別。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, specifies to also search the ancestors of <c>element</c> for custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，指定也會為自訂屬性搜尋 <c>element</c> 的上階。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of the custom attributes applied to a method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 擷取套用至方法參數的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the method parameter, the type of the custom attribute to search for, and whether to search ancestors of the method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定方法參數、要搜尋的自訂屬性型別，以及是否要搜尋方法參數的祖系。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> array that contains the custom attributes of type <paramref name="attributeType" /> applied to <paramref name="element" />, or an empty array if no such custom attributes exist.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 陣列，包含套用至 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的型別 <paramref name="element" /> 的自訂屬性；如果不存在這類自訂屬性，則為空陣列。

trans-unit.source: If `element` represents a parameter in a method of a derived type, the return value includes the inheritable custom attributes applied to the same parameter in the overridden base methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果`element`表示方法參數的衍生型別，則傳回值包括可繼承的自訂屬性套用至相同的覆寫基底方法參數。

trans-unit.target: 無法載入自訂屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the value of this instance is the default value for the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，表示這個執行個體的值是衍生類別的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is the default attribute for the class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體為預設屬性的類別，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this class returns `false`, and must be implemented in the derived class to be useful to that class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的預設實作會傳回`false`，而且必須實作才能發揮作用，該類別衍生類別中。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method in a derived class compares the value of this instance to a standard default value, then returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the value of this instance is equal to the standard value.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別比較中，這個方法的實作標準預設值，這個執行個體的值然後傳回布林值，指出這個執行個體的值是否相等的標準值。

trans-unit.source: The standard value is typically coded as a constant in the implementation, or stored programmatically in a field used by the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 標準值通常是自動程式碼中實作，做為常數，或是實作所使用的欄位中以程式設計方式儲存。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用<xref:System.Attribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns `true` if the assembly has security attributes stored in the new metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，這個方法會傳回`true`如果組件儲存在新的中繼資料格式的安全性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 or later use the new format.
trans-unit.target: 以版本 2.0 或更新版本所編譯的組件會使用新的格式。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件和舊版的.NET Framework 編譯的組件使用舊的 XML 格式。

trans-unit.target: 判斷是否將任何自訂屬性套用至模組。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the module, the type of the custom attribute to search for, and an ignored search option.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定模組、要搜尋的自訂屬性型別，以及忽略的搜尋選項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a custom attribute of type <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 型別的自訂屬性套用至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method ignores the `inherit` parameter and does not search the ancestors of `element` for custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會忽略`inherit`參數並不會搜尋的上階`element`自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Attribute.IsDefined%2A>, taking a <xref:System.Reflection.Module> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用<xref:System.Attribute.IsDefined%2A>，並且<xref:System.Reflection.Module>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: An object derived from the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> class that describes a parameter of a member of a class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> 類別的物件，描述類別成員的參數。

trans-unit.source: The type, or a base type, of the custom attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之自訂屬性的型別或基底型別。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, specifies to also search the ancestors of <c>element</c> for custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，指定也會為自訂屬性搜尋 <c>element</c> 的上階。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether any custom attributes are applied to a method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否將任何自訂屬性套用至方法參數。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the method parameter, the type of the custom attribute to search for, and whether to search ancestors of the method parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定方法參數、要搜尋的自訂屬性型別，以及是否要搜尋方法參數的祖系。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a custom attribute of type <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 型別的自訂屬性套用至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Attribute.IsDefined%2A>, taking a <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用<xref:System.Attribute.IsDefined%2A>，並且<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>做為參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not derived from <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 不是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a method, constructor, or type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是方法、建構函式或型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的這個執行個體相互比較的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether this instance equals a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回值，表示這個執行個體是否等於指定物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance equals <paramref name="obj" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體等於 <paramref name="obj" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines if one <xref:System.Attribute> equals another.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷一個<xref:System.Attribute>等於另一個。

trans-unit.source: Its default implementation is the same as <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>, which determines whether two attributes are of the same type and have the same field values.
trans-unit.target: 其預設實作是與相同<xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>，以決定是否兩個屬性都屬於相同類型，並有相同的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A> method is intended to perform a standard test for reference or value equality.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>方法是執行標準的測試參考或值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method when you want to perform a custom comparison for equality that is based on some criteria other than that two attribute instances are of the same type and have identifical values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法，當您想要執行自訂比較根據某個準則以外兩個屬性執行個體是否相等時為相同類型，而且有 identifical 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can override the <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method to compare attributes in the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法來比較下列案例中的屬性：

trans-unit.source: An attribute includes a bit field, and you consider two attribute instances equal if a particular bit is set.
trans-unit.target: 屬性包含位元欄位，以及您考慮兩個屬性執行個體相等，是否已設定特定的位元。

trans-unit.source: For example, a `NumericDisplay` attribute might include a bit field that indicates what numeric formats (such as binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal) a client supports.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`NumericDisplay`屬性可能包含位元欄位，指出哪些數值的格式 （例如二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位） 用戶端支援。

trans-unit.source: The overridden <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method might consider two instances equal if they support the same numeric format.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法可能會考慮兩個執行個體相等，是否它們支援相同的數值格式。

trans-unit.source: An attribute includes multiple fields that contain the same kind of information, or it contains an array in which values can be in any order.
trans-unit.target: 屬性包含多個欄位包含相同類型的資訊，或包含以任何順序值可以是的陣列。

trans-unit.source: For example, an `Author` attribute might include multiple fields for author names.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Author`屬性可能包含多個欄位的作者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The overridden <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method might consider two instances equal if they have the same authors regardless of whether each field is equal to the corresponding field.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法可能會考慮兩個執行個體相等，是否它們有相同的作者，不論是否等於對應欄位的每個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> to create a custom comparison method for attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>建立自訂的比較方法的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If defines an `AuthorsAttribute` that internally contains a `List<String>` that stores authors' names.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義`AuthorsAttribute`內部包含`List<String>`儲存作者姓名。

trans-unit.source: Because the names can occur in any order in the list, it overrides the <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method to compare author names regardless of their position in the list.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可以在清單中的任何順序出現，因為它會覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法來比較作者名稱，不論其清單中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Note the <xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A> method, which performs a test for value equality, returns different results from the <xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請注意<xref:System.Attribute.Equals%2A>方法，用於執行測試的值是否相等，會傳回不同的結果<xref:System.Attribute.Match%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a unique identifier for this <see cref="T:System.Attribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is a unique identifier for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，屬性的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: As implemented, this identifier is merely the <xref:System.Type> of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，這個識別碼只是<xref:System.Type>的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, it is intended that the unique identifier be used to identify two attributes of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它是唯一的識別碼用來識別兩個相同類型的屬性。
